ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: The gauntlets are an Aviak Charm (off Aviak Avocets) and 2 Star Rubies. The Centaur Merchant in S. Karana is the one offering the quest. Belgarth ...
ygData.messageBody:
The gauntlets are an Aviak Charm (off Aviak Avocets)
and 2 Star Rubies. The Centaur Merchant in S. Karana
is the one offering the quest.

Belgarth

--- Trevalien <trevalien@...> wrote:
> From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>
> I would think you could make ALOT more if you sold
> them to a PC.
>
> What do u turn in for the Crafted Gauntlets? Also
> Who do u give them to?
>
> Trevalien
>
>
> >From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
> >Date: Mon, 30 Aug 1999 12:14:51 -0500
> >
> >From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> >
> >Crafted Gauntlets sell for 238pp to a vendor. This
> is with amiable faction
> >and a 110 charisma. Sold many a pair to vendors as
> it only costs 136pp for
> >the two star rubies. Enjoy!
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Trevalien [SMTP:trevalien@...]
> > > Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 12:14 PM
> > > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some
> idiot)
> > >
> > > From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
> > >
> > > Just out of curiosity, can someone see what a
> pair of crafted gauntlets
> > > sells for to a merchant? (just be careful u dont
> actualy sell them!) I
> >was
> > >
> > > in Felwithe (on povar) the other day and found
> that someone had sold a
> > > pair
> > > to a merchant (the merchant wanted about 3200pp)
> I know how merchants
> >work
> > >
> > > and I figure that he might have goten 50-100pp.
> There was also some
> >other
> > > items that i was amazed that anyone would sell
> but i forget what they
> >were
> > >
> > > (i think a BIBS was in there)
> > >
> > > Trevalien
> > >
> > > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > > >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > >To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'"
> <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > > >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted bracer
> > > >Date: Mon, 30 Aug 1999 11:52:10 -0500
> > > >
> > > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > > >
> > > >I got to do this quest over the weekend. It
> take a sapphire (normal gem
> > > >store sapphire, about 100pp), and a "bunch of
> optic nerves" from an
> >evil
> > > >eye. A 'bunch' (I think it's called a bunch,
> it's optic nerves anyways)
> > > is
> > > >ONE item. goodluck!
> > > >
> > > >-----Original Message-----
> > > >From: Jonathan [mailto:jp1234@...]
> > > >Sent: Sunday, August 29, 1999 2:25 AM
> > > >To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > >Subject: [EQCheats] Crafted bracer
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >The optic nerves for the quest require 'a bunch
> of optic nerves' right?
> > > >They werent no drop so I'm not sure..
> > > >
